description: Try our easy to follow Cucumber, Dill & Yoghurt Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Vegetarian,Egg free
name: Cucumber, Dill & Yoghurt Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs small fresh mint leaves, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Combine garlic, yoghurt, juice, dill and fresh and dried mint in a large bowl. Add cucumber and season with salt and pepper. Toss to coat. Serve drizzled with oil and scattered with pistachios, pomegranate seeds and herbs.
